content: Frankie’s Bakery ships orders Monday through Thursday to ensure freshness. Delivery times vary based on location and shipping method selected.
Due to the perishable nature of baked goods, we do not accept returns. If your order arrives damaged or incorrect, contact us within 48 hours for a replacement or refund.
We guarantee that all baked goods arrive fresh and ready to enjoy. If you’re not satisfied with freshness, we’ll make it right.
Our products may contain or come into contact with common allergens including nuts, dairy, eggs, wheat, and soy. Please review ingredient lists carefully.
We respect your privacy and only collect information necessary to process your orders. Customer data is never sold or shared with third parties.
